author: jaimeleonh
body:
Added new Triple Jet and Muon + Double Jet overlap removal filters so they can be used in the new DoubleTau+Jet path (and its monitoring Muon + Tau + Jet paths) after the transition to ParticleNet.

Won't affect any of the existing paths, so all tests should be satisfied.

All code quality checks were successful. 

No backports needed.
title: Added new Triple Jet and Muon + Double Jet Ov.Rm. filters to be used in the TauPOG PNet transition
